DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether lactate-containing vaginal lubricant effective treatment young breast cancer survivor sexual dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Lactate-Containing Vaginal Lubricant Sexual Dysfunction Young Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: Study scheme - study arm : apply lactate-containing lubricant time sexual intercourse sleep least 3 time per week 8 week - control arm : placebo apply Outcome measure - Female Sexual function Index ( FSFI-20 ) : 0 wk 8 wk - vaginal maturation index : 0 wk 8 wk - vaginal pH : 0 wk 8 wk
DOC.criteria: breast cancer survivor 20 yearsold premenopausal time diagnosis treat operation chemotherapy newly develop dyspareunia cancer treatment recent ( < 2 month ) start cessation hormonal treatment ( tamoxifen etc . ) depression psychological problem active vaginal infection evidence cancer recurrence previously use lactatecontaining lubricant chronic disease severely disturb sexual life
